templates.template: The function ${NAME} has the following purpose: "${PURPOSE}".
The functional device ${NAME} has the following purpose: "${PURPOSE}".

template.description: defines the information received by the top-level function
template.name: Input of top-level function

templates.template: The following information is received by the function ${ANALYSISFUNCTION}: ${INFORMATIONLIST}.

template.description: defines the information received by the top-level function from a functional device
template.name: Input from functional device

templates.template: The following information is received by the function ${ANALYSISFUNCTION} from the functional device ${FUNCTIONALDEVICE}: ${INFORMATIONLIST}.

template.description: defines the information sent from the top-level function
template.name: Output of top-level function

templates.template: The following information is sent from the function ${ANALYSISFUNCTION}: ${INFORMATIONLIST}.

template.description: defines the information sent from the top-level function to a functional device
template.name: Output to functional device

templates.template: The following information is sent from the function ${ANALYSISFUNCTION} to the functional device ${FUNCTIONALDEVICE}: ${INFORMATIONLIST}.
The function ${NAME} is a subfunction of the function ${PARENTANALYSISFUNCTION}.

template.description: states which information is used by a (sub-) function
template.name: Input of sub-function

templates.template: The following information is used by the function ${ANALYSISFUNCTION}: ${INFORMATIONLIST}.

template.description: states which information is created by a sub-function
template.name: Output of sub-function

templates.template: The following information is created by the function ${ANALYSISFUNCTION}: ${INFORMATIONLIST}.
